text: The Dogs of War is a 1980 British American war movie directed by first time movie director John Irvin and was based on the 1974 novel of the same name by Frederick Forsyth. It stars Christopher Walken, Tom Berenger, Colin Blakely, JoBeth Williams, Paul Freeman, Hugh Millais, Hugh Quarshie, David Schofield, Ed O'Neill and Jim Broadbent. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 war movies Category:1980 action movies Category:British war movies Category:British action movies Category:American war movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies set in Africa Category:Movies about coups d'Ã©tat Category:Movies directed by John Irvin
title: The Dogs of War (movie)
